meanings.sent1: She felt undaring when faced with the big dog.
meanings.sent2: The undaring knight hesitated before entering the dark cave.
meanings.sent3: The undaring squirrel refused to jump from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: Her undaring spirit kept her from taking risks in life.
meanings.sent5: The undaring mouse stayed hidden in its hole, avoiding any danger.

meanings.sent1: He gave an undaring speech in front of the large audience.
meanings.sent2: The undaring student avoided speaking up in class discussions.
meanings.sent3: The undaring cat hid under the bed during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: His undaring attitude held him back from trying new things.
meanings.sent5: The undaring explorer stayed close to camp, fearing the unknown wilderness.
